text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1896 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ==Births== ; March * 4 – Bjarne Brustad, composer, violinist and violist (died 1978). ; June * 2 – Arild Sandvold, organist, composer, and choir conductor (born 1984). ; July * 12 – Kirsten Flagstad, operatic soprano (died 1962). ; October * 2 – Soffi Schønning, operatic soprano (died 1994). ==See also== * 1895 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1890s in Norwegian music
title: 1895 in Norwegian music
